title: Ancient Amulet
content: 'I always knew this day would arrive,' Maela sighed, 'but I hoped it would come later, Kael. Hyrule faces great peril. You must learn our family's hidden secrets. This amulet was your father's, passed through generations. It's not just a pretty neckless; it's reservoir of ancient powers. If misused, it's a serious danger to everyone. Our ancestors bound their essence into this amulet. With it, you can call forth their wisdom, strength, and powers.'
